betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Now you've got to the real purpose of the pack Clay Soldiers!

Despite their name their job isn't to fight for you, it's to fight each other for your amusement. You can give them items to upgrade them like sticks to make them hit harder or leather to make them tankier, don't worry about losing said items though, they drop any items they equipped when they die.

You can also mount them on clay horses, pegasi, and turtles.

If they sound fun to you then go ahead and build yourself a pit for them to fight in, hayhaps even setup some redstone to automatically release them and some other cool stuff.
